item.title: Discipline Under Pressure: Shipping Without Messing Up
item.description:
The Reality of Urgency in Startups

It’s crucial for every senior software engineer, technical leader, or anyone accountable for delivering technical solutions to know how to handle urgent tasks wisely. Let’s call this person a leader — and today, that’s you.

In some industries, or at certain stages of a company’s lifecycle, urgent requirements hit technical teams constantly. I currently work as a technical lead at a startup (Done), where the rules of the game seem to change every other week.
